synonyms: prabhura upāṅga—Lord Caitanya's smaller parts; śrīvāsa-ādi—headed by Śrīvāsa; bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees; hasta—hands; mukha—face; netra—eyes; aṅga—parts of the body; cakra-ādi—the disc; astra—weapons; sama—like.
translation: The devotees headed by Śrīvāsa are His smaller limbs. They are like His hands, face and eyes and His disc and other weapons.
